channel.title: NPC Damage modifying?
channel.description:
Hey guys, just wandering where and how do I change how much damage a monster does? Currently a goblin can do up to 7 damage on a 126 >.<.
Also just wandering what version Project 16 v. 6 is? Like 317 or whatever?
Thanks guys
-Matt
